name: M2 Mini Expression
details:
-Passive Voltage Control/Expression Pedal operation. No battery or power adapter needed
-Smooth consistent taper to ensure accurate control of various parameters
-Use stereo (TRS) cable to hook to any device with Voltage Control or Expression Pedal capability
-Alternate TRS jack for devices that have voltage control wired differently
-Cold-rolled steel housing
-Current Draw: N/A (Passive)
-Dimensions: 6.75"L x 4.5"W x 2.75"H
